sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import Mybreadcrumb from "../breadcrumb"; import Header from "../header"; import Footer from "../footer"; import productsData from "./productsData" import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; function ProductDetail(prop) { const {productId} = useParams() const thisProduct = localStorage.getItem("productData").find(prod => prod.id === productId) return (

{thisProduct.name}

( 2 Reviews )
${thisProduct.price}

{thisProduct.description}

add to cart
Add to Wishlist {/* Add to Compare */}
Category: Women, Dresses, Yellow
Share:
) } export default ProductDetail
